          <title>
            <string language="en">Electric circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrischer Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuit électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuito elétrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuito elettrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικό κύκλωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuito eléctrico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This circuit diagram shows two light bulbs connected in series to a cell. The direction of the current flow is indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Current flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light bulbs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">series connection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Schaltplan zeigt zwei Glühlampen, die in 
der Serie an eine Zelle angeschlossen werden. Die Richtung des 
aktuellen Flusses wird angezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce schéma de circuit montre deux ampoules 
reliées en série à une cellule. La direction de l'écoulement
actuel est indiquée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama de circuito mostra dois bulbos 
claros conectados em série a uma pilha. O sentido do fluxo 
atual é indicado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema circuitale mostra due lampadine 
collegate in serie ad una cellula. Il senso del flusso corrente 
è indicato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα κυκλωμάτων δύο ελαφριούς βολβούς 
που συνδέονται εμφανίζει στη σειρά με ένα κύτταρο. Η 
κατεύθυνση της παρούσας ροής είναι υποδειγμένη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este esquema circular muestra dos bombillas 
conectadas en serie con una célula. La dirección del flujo 
actual se indica.</string>
          </description>
